title: Add next small batch of skills to the skill matrix

requirements.summary: Update the frontend SkillsPage.tsx to display the newly added batch of skills, grouped by category and showing unlock status and requirements consistently with existing skill entries.
acceptanceCriteria: Newly added skills appear in the correct category group on the Skills page
Unlock requirements and status are displayed correctly for new skills
Existing skill display is not broken

file_operations.description: Review the current skill display implementation to ensure it properly handles the newly added backend skills. Verify that the listSkills() backend method is being called and that skills are correctly grouped by category. Ensure unlock status checking via the userProfile.unlockedSkills array works for any new skill IDs added to the backend. Confirm that skill requirements (minLevel and minStats) are displayed consistently for all skills including the new batch. No structural changes should be needed if the backend interface remains consistent.
